span.strong: Governor Cooper has signed another Executive Order, Closing all NC Public School until May 15th.

div.h5: The best choice for education in North Carolina.

div.p: Check out this week's consolidated list of updates and reminders!

h3.a: About Drop-Off and Pick-Up in Downtown

div.p: Some reminders about dropping off and picking up students, including instructions to register for…
The ARS Board of Directors is thrilled to announce the next chapter in the ARS story!

div.h2: Our Vision: To be the best choice for education in North Carolina.
Our Mission: To ensure a standard of academic excellence by providing a nurturing environment that allows each child to reach their fullest potential as students and citizens.

div.p: The ARS Board of Directors is thrilled to announce the next chapter in the ARS story!
Everything you need to know for back-to-school in August 2019!
Check out our summer camp opportunities for Summer 2019!
We're excited to announce our season-long summer care program! This program is open to all rising 1st-8th grade students at ARS.
Access the official school calendar for the 2020-2021 school year.
We greatly value the feedback of our parents and community! If you have anything to share, please get in touch.
